action.action-desc: Mr. Garbarino (for himself, Ms. Malliotakis, Mr. Bishop of North Carolina, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, Mrs. Miller-Meeks, Mr. Meuser, and Mrs. Cammack) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To make the assault of a law enforcement officer a deportable offense, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protect Our Law enforcement with Immigration Control and Enforcement Act of 2023 or the POLICE Act of 2023.

section.header: Assault of a law enforcement officer
section.text: Section 237(a)(2) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1227(a)(2)) is amendedâ€”

subparagraph.text: Any alien who assaults a law enforcement officer is deportable.
